briefTitle: A Phase III Study to Demonstrate the Safety and Efficacy of DWP-450 to Treat Glabellar Lines - EV-002
officialTitle: A Phase III, Multi-center, Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo-controlled, Single Dose, Trial to Demonstrate the Safety and Efficacy of DWP-450 in Adult Subjects for Treatment of Moderate-to-severe Glabellar Lines

interventions.name: Botulinum toxin, Type A
otherNames: DWP-450 (Botulinum purified neurotoxin, Type A) Injection

summary: The primary objective is to demonstrate the safety and efficacy of DWP-450 (Botulinum purified neurotoxin, Type A) Injection in the treatment of moderate to severe glabellar lines associated with corrugator and/or procerus muscle activity in adult subjects

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a â‰¥2 Point Improvement in Glabellar Line Scale (GLS) as Independently Assessed by Investigator and and Subject
